snippet: A year ago, the 49ers had a top-tier coach, an All-Pro roster and a talented quarterback. This season, amid speculation about Coach Jim Harbaugh’s future, the team has sputtered and will miss the playoffs.
abstract: San Francisco 49ers fail to reach the playoffs for the first time under coach Jim Harbaugh, who has one year left on his contract; Harbaugh's future with 49ers is uncertain.
lead_paragraph: A year ago, the 49ers had a top-tier coach, an All-Pro roster and a talented quarterback. This season, amid speculation about Coach Jim Harbaugh’s future, the team has sputtered and will miss the playoffs.

headline.main: Pieces That Built 49ers Into a Power Appear to Be Falling Apart
headline.print_headline: Pieces That Built a Power Appear to Be Falling Apart
